name: Update Types on API Changes
description: Review and update TypeScript types when API-related files change

actions.prompt:
A file related to API integration or database schema has been modified. Please:
1. Review the changes in the modified file
2. Check if any TypeScript interfaces or types need to be updated
3. Update relevant type definitions in src/lib/ or component files
4. Ensure type safety is maintained across the application
5. Check for any breaking changes that might affect existing components
actions.description: Reviewing API changes and updating types...
